SELECT m.*,e.maintain_person as maintainPerson,e.munition as munition, e.content as content,t.name as equipName, t.type as type, t.specification as specification FROM ship_equip_maintain m LEFT JOIN ship_equip_maintaindetail e on m.detail_ids = e.id LEFT JOIN ship_equip t on t.id = m.equip_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON m.create_person = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id WHERE m.delete_flag = 1
and t.name like CONCAT('%',#{maintain.equipName},'%')
